title.narrative: Humanitarian Support & Ensuring Equality with Dignity of Disaster Affected Dalit and Adivasi Communi

description.narrative: 1. To provide safe drinking water to the most excluded community in the Rural Areas due to biased infrastructure development and basic amenities created by the local self -governance. 2. To assess the damages to housing, and identify related issues of denial, discrimination and exclusion in early warning, rescue, relief and rehabilitation of Dalit and Adivasi Survivors and communities affected by the Gaja Cyclone in Nagapattinam and Pudukottai Districts of Tamilnadu 3. To engage in effective lobbying and advocacy with the District and State level Authorities to ensure adequate inclusive rehabilitation of Dalits and Adivasis. 4. To promote and strengthen a strong Community Led Movement to engage in consistent lobbying and advocacy with the State to ensure Socially Inclusive Disaster Relief and Rehabilitation in their respective villages.

Creating a Data Base of Damaged Houses in Nagapattinam and Pudukottai Districts affected by the Gaja Cyclone. A detailed survey will be conducted and authentic database of damaged houses in 41 villages of Nagapattinam and Pudukottai districts will be created. Capacity building to youth on survey with regard to housing, basic rights etc. Capacity Building Workshop of Local Community and Youth Leaders on Lobbying and Advocacy Skills. Consultation with the Survivors of Gaja Cyclone, CSOs and CLOs on Effective Lobbying and Advocacy Strategies and Interventions. Advocacy withl local DRR authorities for inclusive DRR. rehabilitation. To provide community pure water facilities to 1225 households.
